description: Compatible with iPhone 4 Apple Bumper Case. Sinjimoru sync stand is a sleek and stylish stand that provides upright resting place for iPod and iPhone while it syncs or charges. The docking station is a convenient and elegant home base stand that will make syncing and charging easier than ever. This compact cradle works with iPhone 3G, 3GS, iPhone 4, Touch 1G, 2G 3G and 4G, iPod Classic, Nano 3G, 4G, and 5G. This supports your iPhone or iPod Touch in both portrait and landscape formats. Easy to store and easy to find. Use your original sync and charging cable to charge or sync your iPod or iPhone (Inside cable clip fits original/certain charge/sync size cable - see picture #5) - cable holder is not compatible with apple cable with release button. iPhone, iPod and cable Not Included. Color Option: Black
title: Sinjimoru Sync and Charge Dock Stand for iPhone 4, 3G, 3GS, and iPod (Black)
